text: If a child theme is added, do you think the parent theme should be hidden when creating a new page? I wonder if this would be confusing to a new user on which one to use.

<@UKHNRHVC7> I am seeing a similar issue when previewing a child theme in the edit mode. It picks up the default theme colors but when I view the live url it displays the author selected colors form the parent theme. (notice the button color changes orange to red)
